citeinfo.title: Predicted distribution of groundfish community types in Newfoundland region from DFO source data, UTM 21 (2007-2013) [NL_PredClust_map]

descript.abstract: This raster layer shows the predicted distribution of 5 unique ecological groupings of groundfish (and a handful of commercially harvested macroinvertebrates) off the coast of Newfoundland and Labrador. The groupings were delineated by hierachical clustering of presence/absence data from DFO annual multispecies trawl surveys from 2007-2013 conducted in spring Mar-Jul (mainly May/Jun) and fall Sep-Dec (mainly Oct-Dec). Their distribution is predicted from a random forest classification model indicating the probabilities that each grouping occurs at a given location based on the value of 22 abiotic predictor variables at that location. Predictions are provided at a resolution of 4 km and bounded by the limits of the RV survey strata with a 5 km land buffer also applied.
descript.purpose: This layer was developed in support of Marine Protected Area network planning; chiefly to facilitate incorporating representative community types in the network plan.
descript.supplinf:
Abiotic predictors used in random forest classification in order of variable importance:
Depth Average minimum annual bottom temperature Averange annual range in bottom salinity Average maximum annual bottom temperature Average mean winter surface chl concentration Dissolved oxygen Average mean summer surface chl concentration Slope pH Bathymetric Position Index (20 km radius) Average mean annual current velocity (E-W) Average mean annual mixed layer depth Average mean annual bottom stress Average minimum annual surface chl concentration Average maximum spring/summer PP Average mean spring surface chl concentration Average mean fall surface chl concentration Average maximum annual current velocity (E-W) Average maximum annual current velocity (N-S) Bathymetric Position Index (0.5 km radius) Average mean annual PP Aspect

enttyp.enttypl: Pixels or cells in band 1 of raster layer
enttyp.enttypd: 108882 pixels (414 X 263) of 4000 m X 4000 m resolution

attr.attrdef: Categorical prediction for type of groundfish assemblage
